alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Burnett; Price; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:51PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms containing gusty winds will impact portions of southern Washburn, southeastern Ashland, northwestern Price, southeastern Burnett and southern Sawyer Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 450 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms capable of producing gusty winds along a line extending from 11 miles west of Butternut, to near Couderay, to 9 miles south of Hertel, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Couderay around 455 PM CDT. Radisson and Exeland around 505 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Park Falls, Shell Lake and Fifield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
